content: Create enums.py - Define DataSourceType and SourceStatus enums with utility methods
Create exceptions.py - Implement exception hierarchy (CoordinationError base + 5 specific exceptions)
Create models.py - Implement DataSourceInfo, LoadOptions, SelectionCriteria, SourceValidation, RefreshResult value objects
Create coordinator.py - Implement DataCoordinator abstract base class and concrete implementation
Update __init__.py - Export all new models, enums, exceptions and DataCoordinator to public API
Verify all 1,005 lines of TDD tests pass and handle CSV entity type mapping correctly
